name: Way of the Hunter: Wild Expeditions
summary:
Way of the Hunter: Wild Expeditions is the ultimate compilation of hunting grounds all over the world. In this authentic hunting simulation, you can explore the vast the in-game wilderness and fulfil all your hunting fantasies. The wide world of Way of the Hunter allows you to follow the many storylines in hunting grounds all over the world, master the challenges of ethical hunting and solve intriguing cases of unethical behaviour. Or venture out in free hunt, and explore the breath-taking landscapes of North America, Europe, New Zealand and Africa to learn about habitats, animal behaviour and ultimately how to manage animal fitness in order to harvest the rarest and most impressive trophies.

This latest edition bundles 6 enormous hunting areas and includes agile UTVs for off-roading. All of this has been enriched with the cosmetics of the Hunter's Pack and the Outfits Pack: 5 alternative outfits for your playable hunters, a beautifully engraved antique shotgun, a cameo paintjob for the car and an impressive wooden carved statue for your Transylvania hunting lodge.

Wild Expeditions includes 6 amazing DLCs:

• Tikamoon Plains is a huge new hunting ground in Africa. Explore diverse landscapes, from windy mountains to deadly deserts and vast savannahs teeming with life. Join Malachi, a professional hunting guide, as he leads a group of adventurers through the thrilling world of Tikamoon Plains, inspired by the African wilderness. Includes bowhunting and 2 top-of-the-line hunting bows.

• Aurora Shores is a breath-taking hunting area in the northernmost part of the USA, the Alaskan wilderness. As a fresh graduate of the Wildlife Trooper School, your job is to protect the natural resources of Aurora Shores. Explore untouched nature with rich populations of wild animals, such as Kodiak bears, Roosevelt elk, Wood bison, and many more. Includes crossbows.

• Matariki Park in New Zealand offers a remarkable blend of biomes. Traverse hilly or mountainous terrain, home to the unique Himalayan tahr and the mighty Sambar deer, and venture into the lowland forest areas, the domain of the majestic Red deer. Immerse yourself in nature's beauty and lifelike wildlife that will keep you engaged for hours, all while offering insights into unique local habits and traditions.

• Lintukoto Reserve is an amazing hunting ground in Scandinavia and the newest addition to Way of the Hunter. Experience the adventures of game warden Mikael and discover the nature and animals of the European North.

• The Outfits Pack contains one original costume for each character - River, April, Wallace, Jackie and Malachi, usable in Free Hunt and Multiplayer mode.

• Hunter's Pack: a shotgun with engravings, a paintjob for the Car, and a wooden carved mouflon statue for the lodge
